original_text: He is not cruel to other people. When he lends money to someone, he gives back anything that he has taken as a guarantee. He does not take things that belong to other people. He gives food to hungry people. He gives clothes to poor people.
korean_text: 사람을 학대하지 아니하며 빚진 자의 저당물을 돌려 주며 강탈하지 아니하며 주린 자에게 음식물을 주며 벗은 자에게 옷을 입히며

sentences.original_text: He is not cruel to other people
When he lends money to someone
he gives back anything that he has taken as a guarantee
He does not take things that belong to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 사람의 물건을 가져가지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: He gives food to hungry people
He gives clothes to poor people
